page.title: 16KINGSLAND CHURCH
page.content: Date 1300. Seats 200. Electoral roll 141. Average Sunday attendance 80. Choir of 20. Sunday School. Traditional and modern services held. Good relationships with other Denominations, e.g. Carol Service shared, Women's World Day of Prayer observed. Eight bells regularly rung. As the school is Voluntary Aided, there are close links, with services and Nativity Play. The Rector is also Priest in Charge of Aymestrey, Leinthall Earles and Eardisland. Rectory (1963) next to church. Assistant Curate has lately been made Deacon in Local Ordained Ministry. Harvest Festival produce is sent to Birmingham. The Bookstall finances the "Kingsland News Letter" delivered free to all houses in the parish. Over 100 different plants have been found in the churchyard. Alethea Eliot
